title: NARUTO.SHIPPUDEN.Ultimate.Ninja.STORM.4.Update.1-ALI213
description:
Install instructions:
- Extract
- Copy contents to main game dir 
- Play

12th February 2016 â€“ Patch notes:
Audio: the issue with the mono sound on the left side has been fixed 
Audio: the game will not lose the sound after reconnecting an audio device 
Audio: the background music will now correctly work in the Rumble Shop in the Village Hidden in the Cloud in Adventure Mode 
Keyboard compatibility: the game will not lose keyboard input after a match 
Gamepad compatibility: the gamepad response has been improved
